page.title: 04SHOPPING IN SYMINGTON 1985
page.content: The old shops in Symington used to be in{Main Street.}This was a very dangerous place to have a shop because there is a very bad bend there. The present shops are placed on {Brewlands Drive.}There is a row of six shops.Kirklands newsagent which sells comics,sweets,papers,stationery and toy cars.Myra's is a hairdressers which styles your hair.Docherty's post office as well as selling stamps also sells food.It has a meat counter and many shelves of groceries.T.A Conner is the butcher.He sells many different kinds of meat.The Halifax Building Society is very useful to account holders in that building society, because it means they won't have to go to town to pay in or take out money. The other shop has closed down now. It used to be a fruit shop.Having shops in Symington is very convenient.
